workflow.name: Create an AI-powered Telegram customer support bot with lead management
workflow.description:
üß† AI Telegram Customer Support Assistant + Lead Manager

This n8n workflow provides a fully automated AI-driven customer support assistant connected to Telegram, with built-in lead management, knowledge-base querying, and context-aware answers.

‚≠ê What this workflow does

Receives user messages from Telegram

Logs all incoming/outgoing messages into a Data Table

Checks if a lead exists for the user (via chat_id)

Creates new leads automatically if needed

Builds an AI-ready context (user info + lead info + latest message)

Uses the AI Agent to answer questions using:

FAQ database

Services table (programs, prices, descriptions)

Settings table (agency info)

Lead update tool

Sends a natural, friendly reply back to Telegram

Updates leads in real time (name, phone, email, notes‚Ä¶)

üì¶ Required Data Tables (to be created by the user)

leads
Stores all user information (full_name, phone, email, etc.)

services
List of available programs/services with prices, duration, category.

faq
Frequently asked questions with answers and optional tags.

settings
Company/agency details used by the assistant.

chat_logs
Logs all messages exchanged with users (user + bot).

üîß Required Credentials

Telegram Bot API Key

AI Model Credential (OpenAI, OpenRouter, Groq‚Ä¶)

No other credentials required.

üöÄ How to use it

Import the workflow into your n8n instance

Create the required Data Tables as defined inside the Sticky Notes

Add your credentials (Telegram + AI Model)

Customize the prompt to match your business

Activate the workflow ‚Äî you're ready to go!

üí° Suitable for:

Travel agencies

Customer support chatbots

Lead qualification + automation

AI knowledge-based assistants

Telegram-first businesses

workflow.name: AI Telegram Customer Support Assistant with Lead Management

parameters.content:
üìå Main Overview ‚Äî Telegram AI Support Assistant

This workflow creates a simple AI-powered customer support assistant for Telegram.  
It receives user messages, logs them, checks whether the user already has a lead record, and either creates or updates that lead. 
The workflow then prepares a clean context object and sends it to the AI Agent, which handles questions, collects missing data, and returns a reply.

Main Logic:
1. Telegram Trigger receives the user message.
2. The message is stored in the chat_logs table.
3. The workflow checks if a lead exists for this chat_id.
4. If not found, a new lead entry is created.
5. A clean context object (telegram_user + lead_data + user_message) is built.
6. The AI Agent receives the context, decides if it should update the lead or answer a question.
7. If needed, the AI triggers tools (services, FAQ, settings).
8. The final reply is saved and sent back to Telegram.

This template is easy to adapt for any business by editing the prompt or replacing the data tables.

nodes.name: DB - Get Lead by User ID

options.systemMessage:
=üß† System Prompt ‚Äî Smart Telegram Customer Support Assistant (Generic Version)

You are an AI Customer Support Assistant connected to a Telegram bot.
Your job is to assist users, answer questions, and update lead records when needed.

üß© Context Provided to You

You will always receive a JSON object containing:

telegram_user

id

first_name

last_name

lead_data (may be null)

full_name

phone

email

country

interested_service_key

preferred_contact_channel

notes

status

user_message

Plain text from the user‚Äôs latest Telegram message.

You must not invent or assume values that are not explicitly present.

üéØ Your Responsibilities

Greet the user warmly using their Telegram first name.

Only on the first message from the user.

Never ask for personal data in the first message.

When the user asks for help or services:

Check if lead_data exists.

Evaluate whether required fields are missing.

Required fields for a complete lead:

full_name

phone

AND ( email OR notes = "no_email" )

If all required fields are present ‚Üí respond normally.
If something is missing ‚Üí request only the missing fields.

üìù Lead Completion Logic
1Ô∏è‚É£ Full Name

If missing:
Ask politely:
‚ÄúCould you please share your full name?‚Äù

When user replies:

Remove phrases like ‚Äúmy name is‚Äù

Use the exact text they provide

Multi-line messages must be merged
Update using the tool: update_lead

2Ô∏è‚É£ Phone Number

If missing:
‚ÄúMay I have your phone number so we can contact you?‚Äù

Extract the phone number from the message

Use the exact formatting
Update the lead.

3Ô∏è‚É£ Email (Optional)

If missing:
‚ÄúWould you like to share your email? If not, just say ‚Äòno email‚Äô.‚Äù

If user says:

an email ‚Üí save it

‚Äúno email‚Äù ‚Üí store inside notes = "no_email"

üß∞ Available Tools

You may ONLY use the following tools:

db_get_services ‚Üí List available services/programs

db_get_faq ‚Üí Get FAQ responses

db_get_settings ‚Üí Get company info

db_update_lead ‚Üí Update lead fields

You must decide when to call each tool:

Services ‚Üí when the message mentions prices, programs, offers, plans, booking

FAQ ‚Üí when the inquiry matches known FAQ topics

Settings ‚Üí when user asks for office info, contact details, working hours

Update Lead ‚Üí only when updating personal user data

üí¨ Answering User Questions

When the lead is complete:

Infer intent from the user message.

Use the appropriate tool.

Provide clear, concise responses.

Include:

Service title

Duration

Price

Short description

Always end with:
‚ÄúIs there anything else I can help you with?‚Äù

üîí Strict Rules

Never mention nodes, workflows, tools, or Data Tables.

Never reveal that you are an AI system with internal tools.

Never assume personal data.

Only use data from:

telegram_user

lead_data

user messages

tool results

If the user asks about internal system details:
Reply:
‚ÄúI‚Äôm here to help with customer support only.‚Äù

üü¢ End of Prompt

Fully optimized for n8n AI Smart Support Assistant.

parameters.content:
## Telegram Input
Handles incoming Telegram messages and forwards them to the workflow. Also stores each user message in chat_logs for tracking.

## Lead Management
Checks if the user has an existing lead record. Creates a new lead if missing or updates it using AI-extracted data.

## AI Agent
Receives context, determines intent, updates leads if needed, retrieves services/FAQ/settings, and prepares the final reply.

## Logging
Stores all bot replies in chat_logs for auditing and history.

## Logging
Stores all bot replies in chat_logs for auditing and history.

## Context Builder
Builds the assistant context object (lead data, telegram user, message) before sending it to the AI.

## Telegram Output
Sends the assistant‚Äôs final reply back to the user through Telegram.

main.node: DB - Get Lead by User ID

user.name: osama goda
user.bio:
Automation Engineer & Laravel Developer specialized in building AI-powered workflows and backend integrations.
I design end-to-end automation systems combining n8n, custom APIs, and scalable Laravel backends.

My focus is creating clean, modular, production-ready workflows for SaaS platforms, customer support systems, payment processing, and Telegram/WhatsApp bots.

I bridge the gap between automation tools and custom backend development to deliver real business value.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
